title: Champion select bug happening 7.2

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I can't ban champion can click on anything in the "match history square" happenend to me twice, then it dodge.

How to reproduce,  click on your past matches and when queue pop accept !

replies.body:
I'd just like to say I had a similar problem that cost me my promos :(

I was viewing a friend's match history, more specifically his most recently played game, when I got the "match found" notification. 

My screen looked just like the one above, with all the details of the match I was looking at still there. The "X" on the upper right of it wouldn't do anything no matter how many times I pressed it. I couldn't lock in a champion so it forced me to dodge.

I submitted a bug report recently showing the same thing, but I thought I'd add it to this thread to show it's been replicated. 

P.S. Happy ending: despite the dodge failing my promos, it put me at 90 LP and I completed the promos again. Didn't give me the free win in those promos though, probably because I dodged out instead of losing out. Could've been 40 LP higher than where I am because of it, but at least it's not all bad.

That's a really strange issue, and curious if you're able to hit the X on the top right corner?  It's like the  post game screen never dropped off.  Your patch on the updated client may not have gone well and resulting in this problem, so a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) may be necessary.   Test this out again in a custom game after and let me know if it persists.
I couldnt click on anything in that square, but I havent tried to redo it because I dont want to dodge 2 games in a row again
Thanks for the follow-up.  Did you have match history open on the updated client before accepting queue?
